properties.description: creating a NSIP applicant view of service user.

source: #### If dev or test, limiting the number of output rows and anonymisation of the sensitive fields is required.

from notebookutils import mssparkutils
storage_account=mssparkutils.notebook.run('/utils/py_utils_get_storage_account')

is_dev = 'dev' in storage_account
is_test = 'test' in storage_account

# limiting the number of output to 20 rows for dev environment
max_limit = 20 if is_dev else 100000000

spark.sql(f"SET MAX_LIMIT = {max_limit}")

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_curated_db.vw_nsip_service_user

AS

---UNION SQL TO GET APPLICANTS, AGENTS AND REPRESENTATIONCONTACTS---

-----------------------REPRESENTATION CONTACTS DATA-----------------

SELECT DISTINCT

    REPLACE(RR.ContactID, 'P_', '')                     AS id,
    NULL                                                AS salutation,
    CASE 
        WHEN RR.Fullname IS NULL
            AND RR.OrganisationName IS NOT NULL
        THEN RR.OrganisationName
        WHEN RR.FullName IS NOT NULL
        THEN RR.FullName
        ELSE RR.FullName
    END                                                 AS firstName,
    CASE 
        WHEN RR.Fullname IS NULL
            AND RR.OrganisationName IS NOT NULL
        THEN RR.OrganisationName
        WHEN RR.FullName IS NOT NULL
        THEN RR.FullName
        ELSE RR.FullName
    END                                                 AS lastName,
    RR.BuildingNumber                                   AS addressLine1,
    RR.Street                                           AS addressLine2,
    RR.Town                                             AS addressTown,
    RR.County                                           AS addressCounty,
    RR.Postcode                                         AS postcode,
    RR.Country                                          AS addressCountry,
    RR.OrganisationName                                 AS organisation,
    RR.RelRepOrganisation                               AS organisationType,
    RR.JobTitle                                         AS role,
    RR.PhoneNumber                                      AS telephoneNumber,
    ''                                                  AS otherPhoneNumber,
    ''                                                  AS faxNumber,
    RR.EmailAddress                                     AS emailAddress,
    NULL                                                AS webAddress,
    'RepresentationContact'                             AS serviceUserType,
    RR.CaseReference                                    AS caseReference,
    RR.IngestionDate                                    AS ingestionDate,
    'Horizon'                                           AS sourceSuid,
    SS.Description                                      AS sourceSystem
    
FROM odw_harmonised_db.casework_nsip_relevant_representation_dim    AS RR
    JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact                   AS SS
        ON SS.SourceSystemID = RR.SourceSystemID
WHERE RR.IsActive = 'Y'
    --AND RR.CaseReference = 'TR020002' --TEST RECORD
        -- AND RR.AgentContactID IS NULL --THIS WAS MEANT TO AVOID DUPLICATION OD RECORDS WITH AGENTS, BUT IS WAS PREFERRED WITHOUT


---------------------------------APPLICANTS DATA-----------------------------

UNION ALL

SELECT DISTINCT
CASE
    WHEN NSIP.CaseNodeID IS NOT NULL
    THEN NSIP.CaseNodeID
    ELSE CaseID
END                                                     AS id,
NULL                                                    AS salutation,
NSIP.ApplicantFirstName                                 AS firstName,
NSIP.ApplicantLastName                                  AS lastName,                                 
NSIP.AddressLine1                                       AS addressLine1,
NSIP.AddressLine2                                       AS addressLine2,
NSIP.AddressTown                                        AS addressTown,
NSIP.AddressCounty                                      AS addressCounty,
NSIP.Postcode                                           AS postcode,
NULL                                                    AS addressCountry,
NSIP.PromoterName                                       AS organisation,
NULL                                                    AS organisationType,
NULL                                                    AS role,
NSIP.ApplicantPhoneNumber                               AS telephoneNumber,
NULL                                                    AS otherPhoneNumber,
NULL                                                    AS faxNumber,
NSIP.ApplicantEmailAddress                              AS emailAddress,
NSIP.ApplicantWebAddress                                AS webAddress,
'Applicant'                                             AS serviceUserType,
NSIP.CaseReference                                      AS caseReference,
NSIP.IngestionDate                                      AS ingestionDate,
NSIP.ODTSourceSystem                                    AS sourceSuid,
SS.Description                                          AS sourceSystem

FROM odw_harmonised_db.casework_nsip_data_dim           AS NSIP
    JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact       AS SS
        ON SS.SourceSystemID = NSIP.SourceSystemID
WHERE NSIP.IsActive = 'Y'
    --AND NSIP.CaseReference = 'TR020002'-- TEST RECORD

----------------------------------AGENTS DATA-----------------------------

UNION ALL

SELECT DISTINCT

    REPLACE(RR.AgentContactID, 'P_', '')                AS id,
    ''                                                  AS salutation,
    CASE 
        WHEN RR.AgentFullName IS NULL
            AND RR.AgentOrganisationName IS NOT NULL
        THEN RR.OrganisationName
        WHEN RR.AgentFullName IS NOT NULL
        THEN RR.AgentFullName
        ELSE RR.AgentFullName
    END                                                 AS firstName,
    CASE 
        WHEN RR.AgentFullName IS NULL
            AND RR.AgentOrganisationName IS NOT NULL
        THEN RR.AgentOrganisationName
        WHEN RR.AgentFullName IS NOT NULL
        THEN RR.AgentFullName
        ELSE RR.AgentFullName
    END                                                 AS lastName,
    RR.AgentBuildingNumber                              AS addressLine1,
    RR.AgentStreet                                      AS addressLine2,
    RR.AgentTown                                        AS addressTown,
    RR.AgentCounty                                      AS addressCounty,
    RR.AgentPostcode                                    AS postcode,
    RR.AgentCountry                                     AS addressCountry,
    RR.AgentOrganisationName                            AS organisation,
    RR.RelRepOrganisation                               AS organisationType,
    RR.JobTitle                                         AS role,
    RR.PhoneNumber                                      AS telephoneNumber,
    ''                                                  AS otherPhoneNumber,
    ''                                                  AS faxNumber,
    RR.EmailAddress                                     AS emailAddress,
    NULL                                                AS webAddress,
    'Agent'                                             AS serviceUserType,
    RR.CaseReference                                    AS caseReference,
    RR.IngestionDate                                    AS ingestionDate,
    'Horizon'                                           AS sourceSuid,
    SS.Description                                      AS sourceSystem
    
FROM odw_harmonised_db.casework_nsip_relevant_representation_dim    AS RR
    JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact                   AS SS
        ON SS.SourceSystemID = RR.SourceSystemID
WHERE RR.IsActive = 'Y'
    --AND RR.CaseReference = 'TR020002'--TEST RECORD
        AND RR.AgentContactID IS NOT NULL --THIS MEANS THEY ARE AN AGENT

ORDER BY ingestionDate DESC

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE odw_curated_db.nsip_service_user
USING delta
AS
SELECT 
    id,
    salutation,
    firstName,
    lastName,
    addressLine1,
    addressLine2,
    addressTown,
    addressCounty,
    postcode,
    addressCountry,
    organisation,
    organisationType,
    role,
    telephoneNumber,
    otherPhoneNumber,
    faxNumber,
    emailAddress,
    webAddress,
    serviceUserType,
    caseReference,
    sourceSuid,
    sourceSystem
    
FROM odw_curated_db.vw_nsip_service_user
## Anonymisation of sensitive fields in dev and test

if is_dev or is_test:

    import pandas as pd
    from faker import Faker
    
    df = spark.sql("select * from odw_curated_db.nsip_service_user").toPandas()

    if(len(df) > 0):
        fake = Faker()
        
        df['firstName'] = [fake.first_name() for _ in range(len(df))]
        df['lastName'] = [fake.last_name() for _ in range(len(df))]
        df['emailAddress'] = [fake.email() for _ in range(len(df))]
        df['telephoneNumber'] = [fake.phone_number() for _ in range(len(df))]
        df['otherPhoneNumber'] = [fake.phone_number() for _ in range(len(df))]
        df['faxNumber'] = [fake.phone_number() for _ in range(len(df))]
        
        df = spark.createDataFrame(df)

        table_loc = "abfss://odw-curated@"+storage_account+'service_user'
        df.write.format("delta").mode("overwrite").save(table_loc)
